disp-quote.p: You must think twice before doing things so that you will not regret. We shall do the right things rather than do the bad things. (You should have sex) only if you really want to have children. I saw news about many children losing lives due to child abuse, and this really made me very sad. (Student J)
In marriage, I will not leave my husband for someone richer or better. I just want to love my husband and accompany him through all the difficulties. (Student K)
